attributes.action: Allow teachers to let students go to the bathroom whenever they need to.
attributes.additional_details: It is considered illegal denying a child access to the toilet. If you are desperate you would still not be allowed then you would get a sore stomach and possibly be sick in the classroom from holding it in
attributes.background: Teachers should be allowing students to go to the bathroom whenever they need to. Especially when girls are on their periods and are too afraid to let the teacher know, i was in high school when i got my period unexpectedly and the teachers would not let me go after saying to them.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for the same action:

Require schools to allow students to have access to the toilet during lessons:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643422

We also cannot publish petitions that do not give a full name.
